short_summary: Canada is seeking offers to provide one Mid-Size Remotely Operated Vehicle to Defense Research and Development Canada.
description: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide one (1) Mid- Size Remotely Operated Vehicle to Defense Research and Development Canada. The period of the Contract is from date of Contract to March 31, 2024 inclusive...
full_summary:
___
**Title**
W7707-227162

**Project Initiation**
Project Title: Mid-Size Remotely Operated Vehicle

**Solicitation Details**
Reference Number: WS3824848490-Doc4037917316
Amendment Number: 2
Solicitation Number: WS3824848490

**Tender Overview**
This solicitation is for a Mid-Size Remotely Operated Vehicle to be provided to Defense Research and Development Canada.

**Contract Details**
Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Contract Address:
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
Contracting Entity Contact: 
 Erin Surette, PSPC 
 Phone: Not Provided
 Email: [erin.surette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:erin.surette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Status**
The tender closing date is July 5, 2023 at 14:00:00.
Tender status: *Expired*

**Evaluation Criteria**
The lowest price shall be the primary evaluation criterion.

**Eligibility and Value Limits**
 Offers are open to all qualified suppliers. NO trade agreement has been identified.

**Compliance Instructions**
Bidders can request a debrief on the evaluation of their bid.  A request can be made to the Contracting Authority by the end of the tendering window.

**procurement information can be accessed at <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16472235>**
